医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
报告称，临床医生渴望使用生成人工智能来支持临床决策今天，全球信息和数据分析领域的领导者 Elsevier Health 发布了《2023 年未来临床医生》报告，该报告是全球健康生态系统的最新动态，反映了医生和护士对医疗保健领域的变化和挑战的看法，包括快速发展的医疗保健领域的变化和挑战。生成型人工智能产品和平台的兴起。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230907/Clinicians-eager-to-use-generative-AI-to-support-clinical-decision-making-report-says.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230907/Clinicians-eager-to-use-generative-AI-to-support-clinical-decision-making-report-says.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8dc6baef-b3ad-4924-90d1-c79819a9e935 Thu, 07 Sep 2023 20:57:30 -0400 Clinicians eager to use generative AI to support clinical decision-making, report says
一半患有青光眼的 70 岁老人不知道自己的病情很难知道您患有青光眼。哥德堡大学进行的一项研究发现，近 5% 的 70 岁老人被发现患有青光眼，其中一半的诊断者并不知道自己患有这种疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230907/Half-of-70-year-olds-with-glaucoma-are-unaware-of-their-condition.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230907/Half-of-70-year-olds-with-glaucoma-are-unaware-of-their-condition.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e4bbe04b-6ac2-448f-8f46-0d0d10fd8599 Thu, 07 Sep 2023 20:50:29 -0400 Half of 70-year-olds with glaucoma are unaware of their condition
新基金可以激励临床证据薄弱的高价药物的开发一项旨在帮助患者快速获得具有潜在价值的新药的新基金可能会激励制药行业开发高价药物，用于治疗临床益处证据薄弱的罕见疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230907/New-fund-could-incentivize-development-of-high-priced-drugs-with-weak-clinical-evidence.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230907/New-fund-could-incentivize-development-of-high-priced-drugs-with-weak-clinical-evidence.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=09a2a243-7777-4582-a23a-10c7f3b6b4fe Thu, 07 Sep 2023 20:43:31 -0400 New fund could incentivize development of high-priced drugs with weak clinical evidence
COVID-19 后血栓可能是导致长期认知问题的原因在 COVID-19 发生时，患者体内发现了两种高水平的蛋白质，这些患者随后出现了包括“脑雾”在内的认知问题，这为他们的症状原因之一提供了重要线索：血栓。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230907/Blood-clots-may-be-a-cause-of-long-term-cognitive-problems-after-COVID-19.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230907/Blood-clots-may-be-a-cause-of-long-term-cognitive-problems-after-COVID-19.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a84c02bf-9ef6-4d8f-9f63-8329b8f4ac42 Thu, 07 Sep 2023 20:37:06 -0400 Blood clots may be a cause of long-term cognitive problems after COVID-19
早发癌症呈上升趋势：研究预测到 2030 年将出现惊人的增长发表在 BMJ Oncology 上的一项国际研究分析了 2019 年全球疾病负担数据集，以探讨全球早发癌症（14-49 岁）不断上升的发病率和死亡率。该研究强调了不同性别和地区的不同癌症负担，确定了生活方式和环境风险因素，并预测到 2030 年早发癌症发病率将显着增加。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230907/Rising-tide-of-early-onset-cancers-Study-predicts-alarming-increase-by-2030.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230907/Rising-tide-of-early-onset-cancers-Study-predicts-alarming-increase-by-2030.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0c2c74d1-c6b2-40a3-9d91-7fe5f8bedf16 Thu, 07 Sep 2023 20:30:00 -0400 Rising tide of early-onset cancers: Study predicts alarming increase by 2030
棕色脂肪真的能让你保持苗条身材吗？新研究深入探讨饮食诱导产热的科学该研究论文深入研究了棕色脂肪组织及其蛋白质 UCP1 在饮食诱导的生热作用中的作用，质疑它是否可能是对抗肥胖的关键。尽管一些证据表明棕色脂肪活动可能影响体重，但该研究仍呼吁进行更多研究，以确定棕色脂肪组织活动减少与肥胖之间的因果关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230907/Can-brown-fat-really-keep-you-slim-New-study-digs-into-the-science-of-diet-induced-thermogenesis。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230907/Can-brown-fat-really-keep-you-slim-New-study-digs-into-the-science-of-diet-induced-thermogenesis。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=eb0a623e-9f34-4436-9b7d-8a219991a20a Thu, 07 Sep 2023 19:15:00 -0400 Can brown fat really keep you slim? New study digs into the science of diet-induced thermogenesis
您的肠道微生物群会影响您的青少年时期吗？新研究深入探讨了终生健康影响研究探讨了肠道微生物群如何影响青少年发育的关键领域，包括心理健康、新陈代谢和骨骼生长。它表明，了解这些相互作用可能会导致基于微生物组的治疗，以实现最佳生长和成熟。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230907/Could-your-gut-microbiome-shape-your-teenage-years-New-study-dives-into-the-lifelong-health-impact.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230907/Could-your-gut-microbiome-shape-your-teenage-years-New-study-dives-into-the-lifelong-health-impact.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=85b977f1-0c68-4f9a-9d61-dd77b36bc437 Thu, 07 Sep 2023 19:04:00 -0400 Could your gut microbiome shape your teenage years? New study dives into the lifelong health impact
您的生物钟是达到最佳运动表现的秘诀吗？综述全面探讨了昼夜节律如何影响运动员的运动表现、荷尔蒙调节和免疫系统功能。该研究强调了一天中运动表现的最佳时间，并强调了昼夜节律在荷尔蒙平衡和免疫反应中的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230907/Is-your-body-clock-the-secret-to-peak-athletic-performance.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230907/Is-your-body-clock-the-secret-to-peak-athletic-performance.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c6a8c2a6-9ceb-4c0d-8088-2b87eb88c0f8 Thu, 07 Sep 2023 18:54:00 -0400 Is your body clock the secret to peak athletic performance?
研究发现数千种药物组合与频繁调整剂量有关研究人员调查了多重用药的复杂性，以及医院环境中联合用药和药物对是否需要频繁调整剂量。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230907/Study-uncovers-thousands-of-medication-pairings-linked-to-frequent-dosage-adjustments.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230907/Study-uncovers-thousands-of-medication-pairings-linked-to-frequent-dosage- adjustmentments.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=daf4a82c-e2c1-418c-b280-c8e2fbd09250 Thu, 07 Sep 2023 15:57:00 -0400 Study uncovers thousands of medication pairings linked to frequent dosage adjustments
使用医用大麻的澳大利亚慢性病患者的整体健康相关生活质量有所改善患有慢性健康问题的澳大利亚患者服用医用大麻后，在使用的前三个月内，与健康相关的整体生活质量和疲劳程度显着改善，焦虑、抑郁和疼痛也得到改善。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230907/Australian-病人-with-chronic-conditions-using-medical-cannabis-show-improvements-in-overall-health-lated-quality-of-life。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230907/Australian-病人-with-chronic-conditions-using-medical-cannabis-show-improvements-in-overall-health-lated-quality-of-life。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=84c0bb40-932e-4bc3-969e-bbbe5338cfcd Thu, 07 Sep 2023 15:53:11 -0400 Australian patients with chronic conditions using medical cannabis show improvements in overall health-related quality of life
